meanings.definition: The quality or state of being concentric.
meanings.sent1: The concentricity of the circles made the pattern beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The concentricity of the wheels ensured smooth rotation.
meanings.sent3: The concentricity of the donut was so perfect, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The concentricity of their friendship circles was evident in their shared interests.
meanings.sent5: The concentricity of the tree rings revealed its age with precision.

meanings.definition: The property of having a common center.
meanings.sent1: The concentricity of the target and arrow was crucial for accurate shooting.
meanings.sent2: The concentricity of the planets around the sun is a fascinating astronomical phenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The concentricity of the pizza toppings made each bite a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The concentricity of the team's goals brought them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The concentricity of the flower petals created a mesmerizing pattern in the garden.
